THSTI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Team Lead Clinic Science and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 19, 2025, 09:35 IST
 Translational Health Science and Technology Institute
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 19-Aug-2025 |  Haryana |  Salary : 110,000 to 120,000




FOLLOW

The Translational Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Team Lead Clinical Science and Administrator Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD, MDS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, and CA can grab this chance and apply for the THSTI Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Haryana.

THSTI Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualifcation
Team Lead Clinical Science	01	MD, MDS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS
Administrator	01	CA

Age Limit for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The maximum age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 1,10,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,20,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

For OBS/ EWS candidates: Rs. 590 /-
For SC/ ST/ Women/ PwBD candidates: Rs. 118 /-
How to Apply for the THSTI Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Team Lead Clinical Science Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable)
Submit the application form and note down the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	01-08-2025
Last Date of Application	21-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
